titles.title: Atchafalaya National Heritage Area Act
A bill to establish the Atchafalaya National Heritage Area, Louisiana.
Atchafalaya National Heritage Area Act
Atchafalaya National Heritage Area Act
Atchafalaya National Heritage Area Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Domenici with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 108-294.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 613.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

bill.summary: Atchafalaya National Heritage Area Act - Establishes the Atchafalaya National Heritage Area in Louisiana.Designates the Atchafalaya Trace Commission as the local coordinating entity of such Area which shall develop and implement an Area management plan for the protection, interpretation, and enjoyment of such Area, subject to the Secretary of the Interior's approval.Prohibits the use of Federal funds to acquire real property.
